short_summary: CBSA needs printing services for E14 forms
description: CBSA requires an Offeror to provide printing services for the supply of the CBSA E14 forms.
duration_in_months: The contract lasts from 2025-03-31 to 2025-03-31 with the possibility of 3-year extensions.}
full_summary:
# Solicitation Number: WS4254480946

## Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested Offerors to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the provision of printing services, specifically for the supply of Border Services E14 forms. 

### Essential Contract Information

| Contract Details | Eng | Dut Fr |
|----------------|------|----------|
| Solicitation Number | WS4254480946 | N/A |
| Reference Number | WS4254480946-Doc4422604846 | N/A |
| Amendment Number | 1 | N/A |
| Solicitation Date | 2024-01-31 | N/A |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-02-21T14:00:00 | N/A |
| Amendment Date | 2024-02-05 | N/A |

### Contract Period

The Contract will start on the date of contract issuance and will end on March 31, 2025, with possible extensions for three (3) one-year periods up to March 31, 2028.

### Purchase Description

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) requires printing services to supply the CBSA E14 forms to users within the Government of Canada. Offerors must demonstrate the capability to print the border services E14 forms according to the provided specifications.

### Solicitation Documents

All RFSO documentation is available for downloading on the Ariba Central (RFX) platform at:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18670812.

### Important Dates

* Solicitation opening: 2024-01-31
* Tender closing: 2024-02-21T14:00:00
* Contract start date: date to be announced
* Contract end date: March 31, 2025 with possible extensions

### Accessing Procurement Documents

Access to the procurement documents can be obtained by visiting the following link:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18670812.

### Contact Information

For more information on this solicitation, please contact:
Gagne, Valerie (SPAC/PSPC)
Phone: 
valerie.gagne3@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca[/vc_column_text]

Feel free to reach out if you need help with anything. Cheers!
